original_text: The Jews assembled in their cities in all the provinces of King Xerxes to attack those determined to destroy them. No one could stand against them, because the people of all the other nationalities were afraid of them.
korean_text: 유다인들이 아하수에로 왕의 각 지방, 각 읍에 모여 자기들을 해하고자 한 자를 죽이려 하니 모든 민족이 그들을 두려워하여 능히 막을 자가 없고

sentences.original_text: The Jews assembled in their cities
in all the provinces of King Xerxes
to attack those determined to destroy them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 멸망시키기로 결심한 자들을 공격하기 위해

sentences.original_text: No one could stand against them
because the people of all the other nationalities
